title: Melo
brief_description: Pierre and Maniche are happily married until she meets Marcel, Pierre’s friend. Romaine and Marcel have an affair which ends tragically. Pierre remarries and before leaving the country he visits Marcel to learn the truth about Romaine. In French with English subtitles.
